documents.title: Microgravity Effects on Plant Growth
documents.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson
documents.summary: Comprehensive study on how microgravity affects plant development and growth patterns in space environments.

documents.title: Radiation Shielding for Mars Missions
documents.author: Dr. Michael Chen
documents.summary: Analysis of radiation protection strategies for long-duration Mars missions and their biological implications.

documents.title: Human Physiology in Zero Gravity
documents.author: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
documents.summary: Long-term effects of zero gravity on human muscle mass, bone density, and cardiovascular health.

documents.title: Space Food Production Systems
documents.author: Dr. James Wilson
documents.summary: Sustainable food production methods for extended space missions and lunar colonies.

documents.title: Psychological Effects of Space Isolation
documents.author: Dr. Lisa Thompson
documents.summary: Mental health considerations and coping strategies for astronauts during long-duration missions.

documents.title: Water Recycling in Space Habitats
documents.author: Dr. Robert Kim
documents.summary: Advanced water purification and recycling systems for closed-loop space environments.

documents.title: Space Medicine Protocols
documents.author: Dr. Amanda Davis
documents.summary: Emergency medical procedures and healthcare protocols for space missions.

documents.title: Lunar Agriculture Feasibility Study
documents.author: Dr. Carlos Martinez
documents.summary: Potential for growing crops on the Moon using lunar regolith and controlled environments.
